meaningMnemonic: Cast a <radical>book</radical> in <radical>gold</radical> to make a <kanji>bowl</kanji>. Books can be bent into the shape of a bowl, so then all you have to do is pour gold over it to keep it in that shape and ta-da! A bowl has been born!
readingMnemonic: The gold <kanji>bowl</kanji> has a <reading>hatch</reading> (はち) attached to it, which used to be the book's back cover. That's fine, you use the hatch as a lid for the bowl!
